entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
